mapper.select: select t.rnum , t.qid , t.qtypenm , t.question , t.url , t.writernm , t.createdt , t.admnum , t.useyn from ( select r_tbl.rnum , r_tbl.qid , r_tbl.qtypenm , r_tbl.question as question , r_tbl.url , r_tbl.writernm , r_tbl.createdt , r_tbl.admnum , r_tbl.useyn from (select row_number() over (order by a.qid desc) rnum , a.qid , b.nm as qtypenm , a.question , a.url , c.name as writernm , date_format(STR_TO_DATE(a.createdt, '%Y%m%d%H%i%S'), '%Y-%m-%d') as createdt , a.admnum , a.useyn from studydb.question a , studydb.quetype b , studydb.users c where a.qtypecd = b.qtypecd and a.writer = c.sabun ) r_tbl ) t

select a.qid , a.admnum , a.qtypecd , (select b.nm from studydb.quetype b where b.qtypecd = a.qtypecd) as qtypenm , replace(a.question, chr(10), '') as question , a.anstype , case a.ANSTYPE when 'M' THEN '객관식' ELSE '주관식' END as anstypenm , a.lvl , case a.lvl WHEN '1' THEN '상' WHEN '2' THEN '중' WHEN '3' THEN '하' END as lvlnm , a.useyn , CASE a.useyn WHEN 'Y' THEN '사용' WHEN 'N' THEN '사용안함' END AS useynnm , a.explanation explanation , a.source , a.url , a.writer , (select c.name from studydb.users c where c.sabun = a.writer) as writernm , a.requser , (select c.name from studydb.users c where c.sabun = a.requser) as requsernm , (select d.name from studydb.users d where d.sabun = a.modifyuser) as modifyuser , date_format(STR_TO_DATE(a.createdt, '%Y%m%d%H%i%S'), '%Y-%m-%d') as createdt , date_format(STR_TO_DATE(a.modifydt, '%Y%m%d%H%i%S'), '%Y-%m-%d') as modifydt , (select itemid from studydb.queitem where qid = a.qid and itemid = 1) itemid1 , (select item from studydb.queitem where qid = a.qid and itemid = 1) item1 , (select itemid from studydb.queitem where qid = a.qid and itemid = 2) itemid2 , (select item from studydb.queitem where qid = a.qid and itemid = 2) item2 , (select itemid from studydb.queitem where qid = a.qid and itemid = 3) itemid3 , (select item from studydb.queitem where qid = a.qid and itemid = 3) item3 , (select itemid from studydb.queitem where qid = a.qid and itemid = 4) itemid4 , (select item from studydb.queitem where qid = a.qid and itemid = 4) item4 , (select item from studydb.queitem where qid = a.qid and anscd = '0') answer from studydb.question a where a.qid = #{qid}

select a.qid , (select (select nm from auth where AUTHCD = t1.AUTHCD) from ratio t1 where QTYPECD = a.QTYPECD) authnm , a.qtypecd , (select b.nm from studydb.quetype b where b.qtypecd = a.qtypecd) as qtypenm , replace(a.question, chr(10), '') as question , a.lvl , case a.lvl WHEN '1' THEN '상' WHEN '2' THEN '중' WHEN '3' THEN '하' END as lvlnm , a.explanation explanation , (select itemid from studydb.queitem where qid = a.qid and itemid = 1) itemid1 , (select item from studydb.queitem where qid = a.qid and itemid = 1) item1 , (select itemid from studydb.queitem where qid = a.qid and itemid = 2) itemid2 , (select item from studydb.queitem where qid = a.qid and itemid = 2) item2 , (select itemid from studydb.queitem where qid = a.qid and itemid = 3) itemid3 , (select item from studydb.queitem where qid = a.qid and itemid = 3) item3 , (select itemid from studydb.queitem where qid = a.qid and itemid = 4) itemid4 , (select item from studydb.queitem where qid = a.qid and itemid = 4) item4 , (select item from studydb.queitem where qid = a.qid and anscd = '0') answer from studydb.question a where a.qid = #{qid}
select a.authcd as cd , a.nm from studydb.auth a , studydb.ratio b , studydb.quetype c where b.authcd = a.AUTHCD and b.qtypecd = c.QTYPECD group by cd order by a.ord, c.ord
select c.qtypecd as cd , CONCAT(c.qtypecd, '. ', c.nm) as nm from studydb.auth a , studydb.ratio b , studydb.quetype c where b.AUTHCD = a.AUTHCD and b.QTYPECD = c.QTYPECD order by c.ord
select lpad(nvl(max(a.qid) + 1, '1'), 6, '0') as qid from studydb.question a
mapper.insert: insert into studydb.queitem(qid, itemid, item, anscd) value (#{qid}, #{itemid1},#{item1},#{anscd1});
insert into studydb.queitem(qid, itemid, item, anscd) value (#{qid}, #{itemid2},#{item2},#{anscd2});
insert into studydb.queitem(qid, itemid, item, anscd) value (#{qid}, #{itemid3},#{item3},#{anscd3});
insert into studydb.queitem(qid, itemid, item, anscd) value (#{qid}, #{itemid4},#{item4},#{anscd4});
